query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [ToName] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [PostAddress] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL)
query.postgres: create table {0} (ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL, ToName citext NOT NULL, PostAddress citext NOT NULL)
